sentences.en: A sailor wearing earring now looks very strange to us.
sentences.cn: 现时水手戴耳环,在我们看来是怪碍眼的.

sentences.en: An earring, especially one with a pendant.
sentences.cn: 耳坠一种耳环, 尤指带有垂饰的.

sentences.en: Earring hooks and posts are made of silver, surgical steel or copper.
sentences.cn: 耳环接触耳朵的勾、柱部分用到了纯银, 医用钢材或者铜.

sentences.en: Fashion Accessories, Fashion Jewelry, Bags, Necklace, Earring , Bracelet Travelling Goods and Equipment.
sentences.cn: 采购产品时尚配件, 流行珠宝, 袋子, 项链, 耳环, 手镯.

sentences.en: How long have you worn that earring?
I have an earring but can't find its companion.
sentences.cn: 我现在只有一只耳环,找不到另一只了.

sentences.en: I'm holding in my hand an earring you once lost.
sentences.cn: 我正将你遗落的耳环握在手里.

sentences.en: I've left my diamond earring in the dressing room.
sentences.cn: 我的钻石耳环落在了更衣室里.

sentences.en: Keep looking. We're bound to find the earring sometime.
sentences.cn: 继续找. 我们一定会找到耳环的. (必定,肯定)

sentences.en: Man B: Don't make such a big deal, it's only an earring.
sentences.cn: 男人乙: 没什么大不了的, 就是个耳环.

sentences.en: Ring roll, earring fasteners and pouches accommodate all kinds of jewelry.
sentences.cn: 辊环, 耳环紧固件和邮袋容纳各类珠宝.

sentences.en: She is wearing a small ruby earring.
sentences.cn: 她戴着一枚红宝石小耳环.

sentences.en: She served her earring as a pin.
sentences.cn: 她将她的耳环充当饰针.

sentences.en: The human has the earring, " Jarlaxle replied. "
sentences.cn: “ 那个人类拿到了耳环, ” 贾拉索答道.

sentences.en: We combed the entire room but weren't able to find my earring.
sentences.cn: 我们找遍了整个屋子,但还是没能找到耳环.

words.tran_cn: 无穗的；无耳的；听觉不佳的

trans.tran_en: a piece of jewellery that you wear on your ear
